text: The "Coat of arms of Manipur" represents Manipur and the Manipuri ethnicity. It appears on the Flag of Manipur and is used by the Government of Manipur, and other state institutions. However, after the Indian Union of Manipur, it is no longer in use. ==Gallery== File:In-29manipur.png File:The Meitei national flag used during the times of Meitei King Khagemba (Khagempa) of Kangleipak.jpg ==Other websites== * http://sardarpatel.nvli.in/media/767 * https://www.crwflags.com/fotw/flags/in-manip.html Category:Manipur
title: Coat of arms of Manipur
